patterns: How many years would it take for a course?
Time to complete a diploma course?
responses: Following years would take to complete the respective courses: Diploma: 3 years | Degree: 3-4 years | Masters: 2 years
Time to complete a diploma Course: 3 Years
Degree Course: After Diploma 3 Years OR 4 Years
Masters Course: 2 Years

patterns: How to apply for hostel room?
responses: Requirements for hostel room are :The id card proof of institution and parents granting letter is must
1) ID card proof 2)Parents Granting Letter 3)Aadhar Card 4)Fees 200Rs/month
Fees: 200Rs/month

patterns: Who is eligible to stay in hostel?
responses: Eligibility for hostel: MUST BE A STUDENT / FACULTY of the college
Any student or faculty of the college, is eligible to have a stay in the hostel.

patterns: Does the institution provide hostel facilities?
responses: Hostel facilities are available.
Facilities provided: all 3 time meal facilities, room cleaning twice a week, separate bathrooms for each room and wifi facilities.
Yes the institution does provide placement facilities.
Placements are available for the fields of: Computer, IT and Civil
Over 100 well- known companies are connected with the institution. To have a brief information about the companies, do visit our site.
Any final year student can appear for the placement.

patterns: When will the result of final exam be declared?
responses: The institution conducts unit tests in regular lectures. 2 mid sems are taken. Lastly the final exams and viva.
The Final examination dates and results would be declared at the website of the board.
The exam schedule is displayed on the institution's website.
Kindly refer the board's website or the institution's website to gather information about your semester's Syllabus.

patterns: What consists of the study Materials?
From where can I get the study Materials?

responses: Our study materials includes: Chapter-wise PPT, Faculty notes, Previous Exams papers, IMP questions, Chapter-wise Assignments.

patterns: When can we do a campus visit?
responses: Campus Visits can be done on weekdays between 10:30am to 6:00pm
One can visit campus on any working day between 10:30 am to 6:00 pm

patterns: What are the facilities provided by the campus?
Which services are provided by the institution?
responses: Facilities: Hygienic Canteen, Indoor Activities Room, Monthly Events and much more :-)

patterns: What are the requirements for admission?
responses: Admission Process can be do done in both online and offline mode. [ONLINE] For admission, 1st fill the form provided on the site which contain marksheet of 10th/12th/Diploma/Degree. Then andhar card number and a photograph is needed. [OFFLINE] Similarly here u need to come to the institution during office hours with a copy of ur marksheet, Adhar Card, 2 photographs. In offline mode the student need to come compulsorily.
Requirements: Marksheet of 10TH/12TH/DIPLOMA/DEGREE, AADHAR CARD COPY, 2 PHOTOGRAPHS
Admission fees: Diploma: Rs.10,000/semester | Degree: Rs.15,000/semester | Masters: Rs.25,000/semester
Mode of payment: ONLINE & OFFLINE

patterns: How can we start admission process?
responses: Firstly, Open ACPC registeration portal of GTU then follow the given steps: 1)Registration 2)Document Verification 3)Publication of Merit List 4)Choice Filling 5)Seat Allotment,

patterns: What resources does the institution provide?
Does the institute provide any resources?
responses: The institute provides all the resources needed. Still if the student wants to bring his/ her own, he/ she is allowed.

patterns: What are the important college dates?
List out some important college dates?
responses: The latest important date: MID-TERMS(COMPUTER-2ND SEM): 22ND MAY TO 30TH MAY. To see more important dates for event, check the academic calender of the college website.
Important dates for event are mentioned in academic calender of the college website.

patterns: How to issue a book from the library?
responses: The college library timings are from 11:00 am to 4:00 pm
Students can issue books from library between 2:00 pm to 3:30 pm. Books can be issued for a week. After that you can issue it again.

patterns: What is the minimum attendance required?
responses: Minimum attendance required is 70%.
According to attendance criteria, a student must be present at least 70% of the total working days. Else possibilities are that the student might get detained.

patterns: Is there any Scholarship provided by the institution?
What are the scholarships provides by the college?
responses: Yes, the college provides: Digital Gujarat and mysy Scholarships.
The college provides: Digital Gujarat and mysy Scholarships.
One can apply for scholarships by either consulting their class mentors or inquiring about it in the student section.

patterns: What is the fees per academic year?
Is there any extra fee other than academics that the students have to pay?
responses: The fees per academic year is Rs.1000. Which consists Rs.200 for the college fees, Rs.500 for the exam fee/semester and Rs.300 for GymKhana Activities. Note: The exact total may vary according to semesters.

patterns: How can we issue a Bonafide certificate?
Where to apply for a bonafide certificate?
What documents are needed to apply for bonafide certificate?
responses: Students can issue bonafied certificate from the students section. They'll receive it after 2 days of their application.
Students can apply for the bonafide certificate in the student section.
For issuing a bonafide certificate, students must submit a copy of their AADHAR CARD, ID CARD and a application note stating the reason. For more inquiry, visit the student section of the college.

patterns: What are the timings for student section?
Student Section handle what kind of issues?
responses: Student Section timings are from 11:30 am to 5:00 pm
Student Section deals with Scholarships, bus concession pass, bonafide certificates, marksheets, transcripts, etc.
The college is GTU & NBA certified.
Certainly. We're open to receive feedbacks. You can submit your feedback in the department's feedback box.
